attributes.action: Persue all means to encourage manufacturers of domestic electical goods to ensure that products consume zero power when switched off while still connected to the mains
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many appliances continue to consume power when they appear to be turned off at the front panel. This can vary from about 2W for a modern washing machine, to 10W or so for some IT equipment.  When multiplied by the growing number of products in a typical household, and the number of houses worldwide, this represents a vast amount of wasted power and is as big a problem as the more publisised standby power issue.
